summary:
Cookie settings

Some Eclipse Foundation pages use cookies to better serve you when you return
to the site. You can set your browser to notify you before you receive a
cookie or turn off cookies. If you do so, however, some areas of some sites
may not function properly. To read Eclipse Foundation Privacy Policy click
here.

DeclineAllow cookies

Projects

The Eclipse Foundation is home to the Eclipse IDE, Jakarta EE, and hundreds of
open source projects, including runtimes, tools, specifications, and
frameworks for cloud and edge applications, IoT, AI, automotive, systems
engineering, open processor designs, and many others.

Technologies

  * Developer Tools & IDEs
  * Cloud Native
  * Edge & IoT
  * Automotive & Mobility

Projects

  * Project Finder
  * Project Activity
  * Project Resources
  * Contribute

Supporters

The Eclipse Foundation is an international non-profit association supported by
our members, including industry leaders who value open source as a key enabler
for their business strategies.

Membership

  * Our Members
  * Member Benefits
  * Membership Levels & Fees
  * Membership Application
  * Member Portal

Sponsorship

  * Sponsor
  * Corporate Sponsorship
  * Sponsor a Collaboration

Collaborations

Whether you intend on contributing to Eclipse technologies that are important
to your product strategy, or simply want to explore a specific innovation area
with like-minded organizations, the Eclipse Foundation is the open source home
for industry collaboration.

Industry Collaborations

  * About Industry Collaborations
  * Current Collaborations
  * About Working Groups
  * About Interest Groups

Research Collaborations

  * Research @ Eclipse

Resources

The Eclipse community consists of individual developers and organizations
spanning many industries. Stay up to date on our open source community and
find resources to support your journey.

Open Source for Business

  * Business Value of Open Source
  * Open Source Program Offices

  * Marketplaces

The Foundation

The Eclipse Foundation provides our global community of individuals and
organizations with a mature, scalable, and vendor-neutral environment for open
source software collaboration and innovation.

# The Community for Open Collaboration  
and Innovation

The Eclipse Foundation provides our global community of individuals and
organizations with a mature, scalable, and business-friendly environment for
open source software collaboration and innovation.
